DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the long-term safety of SM-13496 in patients with schizophrenia.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Tolerability Study of Drug to Treat Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Successful completion of participation in protocol #D1050049 Exclusion criteria: Substance abuse Prolactin level of â‰¥200ng/mL at baseline Pregnancy
